src:
Hasil Liga Italia: Juve dan Inter Menang, Napoli Tumbang
03 Nov 2019, 04:52 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Juventus dan Inter Menang, Napoli tumbang di Liga Italia. (Photo by MARCO BERTORELLO / AFP)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Dua tim teratas Liga Italia Serie A,Â Juventus dan Inter Milan, meraih hasil positif. Inter berhasil kalahkan Bologna sementara Juve menang atas Torino.Juventus sempat kesulitan mencetak gol di Stadion Olimpico Grande Torino di babak pertama dan harus puas bermain tanpa gol. Namun, Matthijs de Ligt berhasil memecah kebuntuan di menit ke-70.Bermula dari situasi sepak pojok, Gonzalo Higuain kemudian mengirim bola untuk dituntaskan De Ligt. Ini menjadi gol pertama De Ligt di Serie A sejak pindah dari Ajax Amsterdam.Sebelumnya, Inter juga berhasil menang atas Bologna di Stadion Renato Dall'Ara. Sempat tertinggal lebih dulu melalui gol Roberto Soriano, Inter berbalik unggul berkat dua gol yang diborong Romelu Lukaku.Gol kedua Lukaku tercipta lewat titik putih di masa injury time. Penalti diberikan setelah Riccardo Orsolini melakukan pelanggaran terhadap Lautaro Martinez di kotak terlarang.Striker asal Belgia itu melepaskan tembakan mengarah ke pojok kiri gawang tanpa bisa dibendung Lukasz Skorupski. Skor 2-1 untuk Inter bertahan hingga laga usai.Hasil ini membuat Inter sempat menggeser Juventus di puncak klasemen. Namun, Si Nyonya Tua berhasil mengambil alih kedudukan setelah sukses mengalahkan Torino.Juventus saat ini mengemas 29 poin dari total 19 pertandingan atau hanya unggul satu poin dari rival terdekatnya Inter. Sementara Roma yang sukses mengalahkan Napoli, berhak menempati posisi ketiga dengan koleksi 22 angka.Hasil Liga Italia, Sabtu (2/11) waktu setempat:Roma 2-1 NapoliBologna 1-2 InterTorino 0-1 Juventus(jun)
text:
Italian league results: Juve and Inter win, Napoli fall
03 Nov 2019, 04:52 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Juventus and Inter Win, Napoli down in the Italian League. (Photo by MARCO BERTORELLO / AFP)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - The top two Italian League Serie A teams, Juventus and Inter Milan, achieved positive results. Inter managed to defeat Bologna while Juve won over Torino. Juvenus had difficulty scoring at the Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino in the first round and had to settle for playing goalless. However, Matthijs de Ligt managed to break the deadlock in the 70th minute. Starting from a corner kick situation, Gonzalo Higuain then sent the ball to finish De Ligt. This is De Ligt's first goal in Serie A since moving from Ajax Amsterdam. Earlier, Inter also managed to win over Bologna at the Renato Dall'Ara Stadium. Coming from behind first through Roberto Soriano's goal, Inter turned in ahead thanks to two goals scored by Romelu Lukaku. Lukaku's second goal was created through the white point during injury time. Penalty is given after Riccardo Orsolini violated Lautaro Martinez in the forbidden box. The Belgian striker fired a shot towards the left corner of the goal without being able to dammed Lukasz Skorupski. Score 2-1 for Inter last until the fight was over. This result makes Inter could shift Juventus at the top of the standings. However, The Old Lady managed to take over the position after successfully defeating Torino. Juventus currently packs 29 points from a total of 19 matches or just one point ahead of his closest rival Inter. While Rome, who successfully defeated Napoli, has the right to occupy the third position with a collection of 22 points. Italian League Results, Saturday (2/11) local time: Roma 2-1 Napoli Bologna 1-2 InterTorino 0-1 Juventus (jun)
